data.title: Dragon Mining Reports Positive Drilling Results at Jokisivu Gold Mine
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Dragon Mining ( (HK:1712) ) just unveiled an announcement.

Dragon Mining Limited has reported encouraging results from their recent underground diamond core drilling campaigns at the Jokisivu Gold Mine in southern Finland. These results, including significant gold intercepts from the Arpola area, provide valuable insights into the extent and geometry of the mineralized lodes as the company continues its exploration efforts. The resumption of exploration activities, with a new drilling campaign set for 2025, underscores the company’s commitment to expanding its resources and potentially enhancing its market position.

More about Dragon Mining

Dragon Mining Limited is a company incorporated in Western Australia, operating in the mining industry with a focus on gold exploration and production.

Technical Sentiment Consensus Rating: Buy

data.title: Circle Group Expands Port Automation in Mediterranean Terminal
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Circle SpA ( (IT:CIRC) ) has shared an update.

Circle Group, through its subsidiary eXyond, has signed a contract worth 100,000 euros to expand the rubber gate automation system at a Mediterranean port terminal. This initiative is part of a broader effort to digitalize and modernize port terminal infrastructures, enhancing efficiency and safety. The project, expected to be completed by June 2025, will leverage advanced technologies to improve vehicle traffic management and operational efficiency, aligning with Circle Group’s industrial plan ‘Connect 4 Agile Growth’.

More about Circle SpA

Founded in Genoa in 2012, Circle S.p.A. is an innovative SME that leads the Circle Group. The company specializes in developing solutions for the digitalization and innovation of port and intermodal logistics sectors. It offers international consulting on Green Deal and energy transition topics. The Circle Group includes several software and consulting firms, enhancing its portfolio in IoT, Optimization, Digital Twin, Big Data, and Process Automation.

Average Trading Volume: 7,138

Technical Sentiment Consensus Rating: Sell

Current Market Cap: €38.11M

data.title: OVHcloud Enhances Data Resilience with New Object Storage Solution in Paris
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

An announcement from OVH Groupe SAS ( (FR:OVH) ) is now available.

OVHcloud has launched its Object Storage Standard 3-AZ in the Paris region, enhancing data resilience by distributing data across three availability zones. This deployment model is designed to prevent service interruptions, offering a 99.99% SLA and robust data protection features. It aims to serve critical cloud workloads across various industries, ensuring data safety even in case of an availability zone failure.

More about OVH Groupe SAS

OVHcloud is a global leader in cloud computing, offering a comprehensive public cloud portfolio with over 40 products and services. The company focuses on providing solutions that meet high resilience and continuity requirements, catering to industries such as banking, healthcare, insurance, and governmental organizations.

The latest update is out from Restore ( (GB:RST) ).

Restore PLC announced a change in major holdings as Harwood Capital LLP increased its voting rights to 10.01577% from a previous position of 9.17698%. data.title: Cadogan Energy Solutions Issues New Shares to CEO
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

The latest announcement is out from Cadogan Petroleum ( (GB:CAD) ).

Cadogan Energy Solutions has issued 7,000,000 new ordinary shares to its CEO, Mr. Fady Khallouf, as part of a bonus related to a loan recovery. This move is structured to avoid immediate cash outflow for the company, with Mr. Khallouf covering the tax liability personally. The new shares are set to commence trading on the London Stock Exchange, impacting the company’s total voting rights, which may influence shareholder disclosures.

More about Cadogan Petroleum

Cadogan Energy Solutions is an independent energy company operating an exploration and production license in Western Ukraine. It engages in gas trading operations and provides services to E&P companies. Currently, Cadogan is developing power generation projects in Western Ukraine, aiming to offer diversified energy solutions with a lower environmental impact.

data.title: Shanshan Brand Management Proposes Name Change to Reflect Fashion Focus
data.description:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

An update from Shanshan Brand Management Co. Ltd. Class H ( (HK:1749) ) is now available.

Shanshan Brand Management Co., Ltd. has announced a proposed change in its company name to Ningbo Maoye Fashion Brand Management Co., Ltd., pending internal considerations and approval from relevant authorities. This change signifies a potential strategic shift in the company’s market positioning, emphasizing its focus on fashion brand management. The decision is to be finalized at an Extraordinary General Meeting (EGM), where shareholders will vote on the proposed name change and amendments to the Articles of Association. The outcome of the EGM and further related announcements will be communicated in due course.

More about Shanshan Brand Management Co. Ltd. Class H

Shanshan Brand Management Co., Ltd. is a joint stock company incorporated in the People’s Republic of China, primarily operating in the brand management sector. The company’s market focus includes fashion and clothing, as indicated by its proposed name change to Ningbo Maoye Fashion Brand Management Co., Ltd.

Irish Residential Properties REIT ( (GB:0QT8) ) just unveiled an update.

Irish Residential Properties REIT has announced a change in major holdings, as Ameriprise Financial, Inc. has acquired a 3.241% voting rights stake in the company. This transaction highlights Ameriprise’s strategic interest in IRES, potentially impacting the company’s shareholder structure and market positioning, with Columbia Threadneedle Management Limited holding the majority of voting rights within the Ameriprise group.

More about Irish Residential Properties REIT

Irish Residential Properties REIT plc (IRES) is a real estate investment trust focused on the residential property sector in Ireland. It primarily invests in and manages residential rental accommodations, providing services related to property management and leasing.
